pahadiliwa kiwa yuthuyi me kiyanne wiwahayen passe upathpalana kopu bawithayata oba akamathinam wisadumakwidiyata upathakpalana pethi walata yomuwanawanam ee eà·Š aya anugamanaya kala yuthu piliwalayi upath palana pethi ganna oone samanyayen tharuniyakage osap wima aarambha una dawase idalayi.lingikawa ekathu wunata passe ganna eken gab ganimaya wala kimaya 100%k thahawuru karanna ba.wisheshama de thamayi upath palana pethi tharuniyak dinapatha pawichchi kala yathuyi.peththak dekak biwwa kiyala 100%k prathipala ganna ba me pethi ekke pak ekak widiyata.dawas 21ta dawas 28ta dawas 91ta me pethi paks enawa.aniwaryayen dawasagane me peththak bonna amathaka karannepa me pethi ganna kalin waidya warayekwa hamuwela gannawanam wadath hodayi.samanyayen upath palana pethi pak rapiyal 3500ye sita ihalata thibenawa upathpalana pedi dinapatha panaya kirimen loku athuru aabadha athi wenne na.samanyayen lingika ekathuwimedi sulu sulu wenas hagim osap wimedi wenadata wada rudhiraya tharamak pita wima wage dewal kihipayak witharayi thiyenne.mewath oba upathpalana pethi ganna patan aragena masa 2-3th yanakota athi wenne na.pawichchiyata purudu wuna mul kalaye witharayi podi podi atharu aabadha athi wenne.namuth eewa digin digatama wenawanam waidya prathikara ganima ithamath wadagath.
